personal.name: Vasu Garg
personal.title: Web3 Full-Stack Developer
personal.tagline: Building the Future of Decentralized Web
personal.bio: Passionate Web3 full-stack developer with expertise in blockchain technologies, smart contracts, and decentralized applications. I specialize in Solidity, React, Node.js, and modern Web3 tools to create innovative solutions for the decentralized future.

projects.title: DeFi Lending Protocol
projects.description: A decentralized lending and borrowing platform built on Ethereum with automated liquidation mechanisms and dynamic interest rates.
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive DeFi lending protocol featuring collateralized loans, automated liquidations, and governance tokens. Implemented advanced smart contract security patterns and integrated with Chainlink oracles for price feeds.

projects.title: NFT Marketplace
projects.description: A full-featured NFT marketplace with minting, trading, and royalty distribution functionality built on Polygon network.
projects.longDescription: Created a gas-efficient NFT marketplace on Polygon with lazy minting, batch operations, and creator royalties. Features advanced search, filtering, and auction mechanisms.

projects.title: DAO Governance Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive DAO governance platform with proposal creation, voting mechanisms, and treasury management features.
projects.longDescription: Developed a full-stack DAO governance platform enabling decentralized decision-making with time-locked proposals, quadratic voting, and multi-sig treasury management.

projects.title: Cross-Chain Bridge
projects.description: A secure cross-chain bridge enabling asset transfers between Ethereum and Polygon networks with minimal fees.
projects.longDescription: Built a trustless cross-chain bridge using LayerZero protocol for seamless asset transfers. Implemented advanced security measures and optimistic verification.

projects.title: Web3 Social Network
projects.description: A decentralized social network with token-gated communities and NFT profile pictures, built on IPFS and Ethereum.
projects.longDescription: Created a Web3-native social platform featuring decentralized storage, token-based access control, and NFT integrations. Users own their data and content.

experience.description: Led development of core DeFi protocols and smart contract architecture. Mentored junior developers and established security best practices.
achievements: Developed and deployed 15+ smart contracts managing $2M+ TVL
Reduced gas costs by 40% through contract optimization
Built comprehensive test suites with 95%+ coverage

experience.description: Developed Web3 integrations for traditional web applications and built dApp frontends with modern React frameworks.
achievements: Integrated Web3 wallets into existing platforms
Built responsive dApp interfaces for 5+ protocols
Implemented efficient state management with Redux

experience.description: Contributed to frontend development of blockchain analytics dashboard and learned Web3 development fundamentals.
achievements: Built interactive charts for blockchain data visualization
Implemented responsive design for mobile users
Collaborated with design team on user experience
President of Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Club

achievements.title: DeFi Protocol Launch
achievements.description: Successfully launched a DeFi lending protocol that reached $2M TVL within 3 months

achievements.title: Open Source Contributions
